answers.answer: I am looking pregnant this week. I am 15 weeks also and look about 6 months! I am jot concerned. I have actually lost about 5 pounds.
Is this your second baby? Women tend to get bigger quicker after their first. If not, ask your doctor to check you out for twins or excess fluid.

Dont worry too much. every pregnancy n every person is different. I am 37+3 weeks n I barely look 5 months pregnant. People cannot believe how far along I am. As long as the baby is healthy nothing else matters.

This is my 4th baby & I gaind all my weight very early on with this pregnancy & my last!  It makes keeping quiet untill 12 weeks hard lol but I found I slowed down alot by 20 weeks only my bump grew from then on :-) if ur concerned ask ur doc they may run tests for diabetes & look into water retention,  at least it will put ur mind at rest :-)
This is my second baby, and I'm actually smaller with this one

question: 15 weeks pregnant and already looking 7 months. .. how is this possible. And I've only gained 6 lbs thus far.... I'm so concerned I'm retaining water already...I mean I am huge..... concerned. ..
title: anyone else give for your gestational age?
